channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Your Daily Coffee Fix Could Be a Secret Weapon Against Dementia, Study Finds
item.description: New research finds caffeinated coffee or tea consumption is linked to reduced dementia risk.

item.title: The Hits, Misses, and Snubs of the Super Bowl 2026 Trailers
item.description: We had promos of astronauts, mercenaries, and Mario through Super Bowl LX. How'd they all stack up against each other?

item.title: We might finally be getting Linux 7.0 at last
item.description: Linux 6.19 is out which can only mean one thing – Torvalds confirms Linux 7.0 is coming next.

item.title: Linux 6.19 arrives with a teaser for Linux 7.0
item.description: On Sunday, Linux developer Linus Torvalds announced the release of Linux 6.19, which will be the last update in this kernel cycle, as previously reported by Phoronix. It adds support for the modern AMDGPU driver for older AMD GCN 1.0 and 1.1 graphics cards, like Radeon HD 7000 series GPUs, along with Vulkan support through […]

item.title: I tested the Lenovo ThinkPad X13 Gen 6 - a featherlight business laptop that's good for on-the-go productivity and only let down by the screen
item.description: The Lenovo ThinkPad X13 Gen 6 is a featherlight productivity laptop designed for business professionals on the go.

item.title: ‘You won’t see what’s coming next — I can’t stop watching’: fans are hooked on a new Nordic Prime Video show that will keep you up at night
item.description: You don’t need The Killing or Trapped — this new Prime Video show is the perfect Nordic Noir to stream during the woeful winter weather.

item.title: TP-Link Omada SG3218XP-M2 review: TP-Link is moving the bandwidth dial with a switch for Wi-Fi 7 PoE access points
item.description: TP-Link Omada SG3218XP-M2 is an industrial network switch that can be cloud-managed and is perfect for WiFi 7 PoE deployments

item.title: Pourquoi iTunes résiste encore et toujours face à Spotify, Deezer et même… Apple Music !
item.description: Depuis que les plateformes de streaming audio dominent le monde la musique numérique, on aurait pu penser qu'iTunes allait disparaître. Mais non.

item.title: Proton VPN has just fixed this issue on Windows – you can now use three critical features together
item.description: Proton VPN users on Windows no longer have to choose between convenience and security. A new update allows the app's three most powerful tools to run simultaneously.

item.title: YouTube TV introduces cheaper bundles, including a $65/month sports package
item.description: YouTube TV is offering new, less expensive plans that can be customized around topics like sports, news and entertainment.

item.title: Grab Apple's iPhone Air MagSafe battery while it's down to an all-time low
item.description:
Despite its supremely sleek design, the iPhone Air actually has a pretty respectable battery life, lasting for somewhere in the region of 27 hours if you’re continuously streaming video. But you’re still going to be wary of it dying on you if you’re on a trip or just having a particularly screen-heavy day. That’s where Apple’s iPhone Air MagSafe battery pack comes in, and it’s currently on sale for $79.
This accessory only works with the iPhone Air, but much like the phone it attaches to, it’s extremely slim at 7.5mmm, so crucially doesn’t add so much bulk when attached that it defeats the p...

item.title: Les 10 smartphones les plus populaires de la semaine sur Frandroid : Xiaomi et Samsung au coude à coude, OnePlus en embuscade
item.description: Pour notre top 10 des smartphones les plus populaires de la semaine sur Frandroid, Xiaomi et Samsung continuent de rivaliser, tandis que OnePlus tente de se faire une place.

item.title: Dyson casse le prix de son balai aspirateur qui lave aussi les sols : une offre à ne pas manquer
item.description: Dyson est réputé pour ses balais aspirateurs sans fil et propose sur certains de ses modèles une brosse lavante pour laver les sols. C'est justement le cas du Cyclone V10 Submarine, qui passe de 549 euros à 449 euros sur le site officiel.

item.title: This Shark vacuum has a genius feature I haven't seen anywhere else – and it's the reason it remains unbeaten in my cleaning tests
item.description: The Shark PowerDetect Cordless has a secret weapon for efficient cleaning.

item.title: Discord to roll out age verification next month for full access to its platform
item.description: All users will be put into a "teen-appropriate experience" by default unless they prove that they are adults.

item.title: Striking a perfect balance between budget and performance, the Chuwi CoreBook Air impressed me with its work-focused features
item.description: The Chuwi CoreBook Air is a 14-inch mid-range Windows laptop designed for everyday work, students, and business professionals. It’s a powerful yet affordable workstation that will keep up with the demands of the modern office, from productivity to some light content creation.

item.title: 'The drones can buzz off' — noisy FPV drones at the Winter Olympics are capturing stunning action, but dividing opinion
item.description: FPV drones are offering a dramatic new perspective at the 2026 Winter Olympics, but many viewers are labelling them a distraction.

item.title: How to take AI from pilots to deliver real business value
item.description: How can organizations turn experimental AI pilots into full-scale programs with real business value?

item.title: The 'RePod Ultra' turns your 'forgotten' Apple Watch Ultra into an iPod, complete with scroll wheel — but the description makes some pretty outlandish points
item.description: I'm not sure we all an Ultra sitting unloved in a drawer, as seems to be the implication here with this otherwise interesting idea…

item.title: YouTube TV’s sports-focused package will cost $64.99 / month
item.description: YouTube TV has shared more details about the custom channel packages it will start rolling out this week. The new packages are cheaper than YouTube TV's standard $82.99 / month plan, and will span sports, entertainment, and news. Here's a breakdown of each package: YouTube TV says people who sign up for one of these […]

item.title: Presidents' Day sales 2026: The best tech deals to shop early from Apple, Sony, Samsung and others
item.description: Presidents’ Day is a great time to buy appliances, mattresses and furniture as they are often on sale for the holiday. Tech also gets discounted around this time, but you have to do a bit more digging to find actually good deals. And this year, Presidents’ Day comes right after Valentine’s Day and Super Bowl 2026, which means there are some overlapping sales to consider. If you don’t want to sort through the mess of bad deals out there, Engadget has you covered. We’re curating the best President Day sales on tech we can find right here. We’ll update this post through the holiday as more deals ...

item.title: Apple's Magic Mouse drops to only $68
item.description:
Apple's USB-C Magic Mouse is back on sale for about $11 off its usual retail price of $79. At $68, that's a savings of 14 percent for one of Apple's best accessories from a company that does not often run sales.
The multi-touch mouse was first released in 2009 with a modest refresh released in 2015 and the addition of a USB-C port in 2024. The rechargeable mouse features gesture controls and automatically pairs with your Mac when connected via USB. The Magic Mouse can also be used with an iPad via Bluetooth, or with a Windows PC, though in that case, functionality would be limited. Famously...

item.title: J’ai acheté un Xiaomi en Chine : fausse bonne idée ou vrai bon plan ? Ce qu’il faut savoir
item.description: Vous êtes devant un Xiaomi Store à Shanghai ou sur un site d'import et les prix vous font de l'œil. C'est tentant, n'est-ce pas ? Avant de craquer pour cette version chinoise sortie avec six mois d'avance, regardons si le jeu en vaut vraiment la chandelle.

item.title: Digital technology, the solution to U.K. manufacturing’s workforce challenges
item.description: The solution to reducing the demand for labor comes from organizations optimizing existing resources.

item.title: Ferrari Luce : voici à quoi aurait pu ressembler la voiture d’Apple
item.description: Des boutons, des leviers, des interrupteurs… Jony Ive, l'ex-designer en chef d'Apple, a travaillé pendant cinq ans sur le design intérieur de la Ferrari Luce, première voiture 100 % électrique du prestigieux constructeur automobile. Et il a multiplié les contrôles physiques, à rebours de son obsession tactile sur l'iPhone.

item.title: I tested out the LG UltraFine 6K Evo 32U990A - a 6K monster of a monitor with 21 million pixels but also a few flaws
item.description: You're going to have to really want all those pixels.

item.title: I tested the Dell Pro Max Tower T2 - a powerful desktop workstation for engineering and AI
item.description: Ideal for those who need uncompromised performance for computationally intensive workflows.

item.title: iPhone Fold rumors: Everything we know so far, including the leaked foldable design, upgrades, price and more
item.description: Apple still hasn’t confirmed plans for a foldable iPhone, but the rumors around the so-called iPhone Fold keep getting louder. After years of speculation, multiple reports now suggest Apple could be aiming for a launch in the second half of 2026, with new details trickling out about the phone’s design, display tech and where it might sit in the iPhone lineup.As with any unannounced Apple product, nothing is locked in. Features can change, timelines can move and some ideas may never make it beyond internal testing. That said, recent reporting from supply-chain sources, analysts and leakers give...

item.title: Unlock Talk is back et un épisode pilote de notre nouvelle Matinale : voici notre programme Twitch de la semaine
item.description: Notre programme Twitch de la semaine du lundi 9 févier 2026, c’est juste ici : nous vous donnons rendez-vous, mercredi, jeudi et jeudi sur notre chaîne Frandroidlive, autant pour siroter votre café devant notre Matinale Tech' que pour profiter d'une nouvelle émission Unlock Talk.

item.title: Discord va forcer la vérification de votre identité très prochainement
item.description: Discord annonce le déploiement international d'une mesure déjà présente au Royaume-Uni : la vérification de l'âge pour tous les utilisateurs.

item.title: Uber to buy delivery arm of Turkey’s Getir
item.description: The deal will see Uber paying $335 million at the outset to purchase Getir's food delivery business. Uber will also pay $100 million for a 15% stake in Getir's grocery, retail and water delivery business.

item.title: Beat the RAM shortage: How to get 32GB of Corsair DDR5 for cheap before prices climb even higher
item.description: Save over $50 on this 16GB Corsair Vengeance RGB DDR5-5200 kit right now, as memory prices continue to climb.

item.title: The ‘Rick and Morty’ Comic Is Ending Again (for Real This Time) (Exclusive)
item.description: The double-sized 'Rick and Morty Forever' arrives in May from writer Daniel Kibblesmith and artist Troy Little.

item.title: Siemens CEO Roland Busch’s mission to automate everything
item.description: Today, I’m talking with Roland Busch, who is the CEO of Siemens. Siemens is one of those absolutely giant, extremely important, but fairly opaque companies we love to dig into on Decoder. At a very basic, reductive level, Siemens makes the hardware and software that allow other companies to run and automate their stuff. Everyone […]

item.description: Submit to speak at TechCrunch Founder Summit 2026 to lead a roundtable. Share scaling insights with 1,100 founders on June 23 in Boston. Apply here.

item.description: Yakuza Kiwami 3 & Dark Ties supplies cathartic combat and a whole lot of new content, but can it live up to the high standards that RGG Studio set with its previous remakes?

item.description: Popular image sharing site had its data compromised in a third-party breach.

item.title: The first PlayStation State of Play of 2026 will air on February 12
item.description: The first PlayStation State of Play livestream of 2026 has been announced. The stream will take place on February 12 at 5PM ET. It will run for over an hour and feature PlayStation Studios titles as well as third-party projects and indie games that are bound for PS5. You can watch it on PlayStation’s official YouTube channel (in English, Japanese or with English subtitles) or on Twitch. As the first State of Play of the year, Sony is going to want to drum up some more hype for its upcoming release slate. Since Bungie’s Marathon is due to arrive on March 5, that will surely make an appearance....

item.title: The iPhone 17e could land ‘imminently’, with no price rise – but it might not be much of an upgrade
item.description: The iPhone 17e might be about to launch, with a new chipset, MagSafe, and last year's price tag.

item.title: HBO Max is finally coming to the UK and Ireland
item.description: A big day in streaming has finally arrived: HBO Max has finally announced it's coming to the United Kingdom and Ireland. The two countries join over 110 territories worldwide that already offer HBO Max. Some HBO shows, like Euphoria, have already been available in these regions through other platforms. HBO Max will bring titles like The Pitt, One Battle After Another and Sinners. It will also air the upcoming Harry Potter series. An HBO Max subscription will be available in the UK and Ireland starting on Thursday, March 26. Plans will start at Basic with Ads for £5 per month, offering all tit...

item.title: La trottinette électrique Pure Electric Escape avec 200 € de moins : autonomie et confort pour un usage urbain
item.description: La Pure Electric Escape 350W est un modèle de trottinette électrique urbaine et pliable, conçue pour les trajets en ville, qui mêle stabilité et robustesse. Le tout en promo pour 299,99 euros au lieu de 499,99 euros sur Darty.

item.title: OpenAI will reportedly start testing ads in ChatGPT today
item.description: OpenAI plans to start testing ads in ChatGPT today, according to a report from CNBC. The "clearly labeled" ads will appear in a separate area beneath your chat, OpenAI announced last month. A source close to the situation tells CNBC that OpenAI "expects ads to make up less than half of its revenue long term." […]

item.title: Même les voleurs ne les veulent pas : les voitures électriques, ce repoussoir sur quatre roues
item.description: Les voitures électriques n’attirent pas les voleurs. Les véhicules dotés d’une batterie et de moteurs électriques sont vingt fois moins victimes de vols que leurs équivalents thermiques.

item.title: Le compte à rebours est lancé : la Nasa confirme le lancement de Crew-12 avec à son bord Sophie Adenot
item.description: Les doutes concernant le lancement en temps et en heure de la mission Crew-12 emportant Sophie Adenot vers l’ISS sont désormais levés. La Nasa a annoncé officiellement que le départ de l’équipage aurait bien lieu le 11 février prochain !

item.title: The battle begins: 2026 Startup Battlefield 200 nominations are open
item.description: Calling Pre-Series A founders: nominations for TechCrunch Startup Battlefield 200 are open. Compete in the world’s most iconic pitch competition at Disrupt 2026 from October 13 - 15.

item.title: The world’s first EV with a sodium-ion battery has landed – and it beats traditional lithium batteries in one key way
item.description: A new sodium-ion battery technology has arrived in a new Chinese EV – and it promises to beat lithium-ion batteries in one important way.

item.title: SpaceX is pivoting to focus on a moon base before Mars
item.description: Elon Musk says SpaceX has shifted its near-term priorities from Mars settlement plans to building what he called a “self-growing city on the Moon,” arguing the lunar target is faster and more achievable. In a post on X, Musk claims the company could complete this in less than 10 years, while doing the same on Mars would take over 20 years. This marks a major shift for the aerospace company, as Musk points out that the logistics of first completing a proof of concept on the moon are easier with respect to launch windows and proximity to Earth. The SpaceX founder is notorious for promising optim...

item.title: Heres a simple trick for getting over someone
item.description: This simple exercise — you only need a pen and paper — can help you exorcise your relationship demons.

item.title: Ferrari dévoile le magnifique intérieur de sa voiture électrique : l’inspiration d’Apple est marquée
item.description: Ferrari vient de dévoiler l'intérieur de sa voiture électrique. On sent clairement l'inspiration Apple et c'est vraiment réussi comme vous pouvez le voir sur les photos officielles.

item.title: I've tested dozens of robot vacuums, and this model has some of the best carpet cleaning I've ever seen
item.description: The Qrevo Curv 2 Pro robot vacuum handles even thick-pile carpet with ease.

item.title: The lonely state of getting over someone you never dated
item.description: Getting over someone you never dated is a lonely experience and one that's easy to invalidate. But your feelings are valid and should be acknowledged.

item.title: ‘Take the vaccine’ urges Dr. Oz as the U.S. measles outbreak rages on
item.description: The U.S. is on the brink of losing its measles elimination status. A leading U.S. health official on Sunday urged people to get inoculated against the measles at a time of outbreaks across several states and as the United States is at risk of losing its measles elimination status.“Take the vaccine, please,” said Dr. Mehmet Oz, the Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services administrator whose boss has raised suspicion about the safety and importance of vaccines. “We have a solution for our problem.”Oz, a heart surgeon, defended some recently revised federal vaccine recommendations as well as p...

item.title: Pick up the Apple Watch Series 11 while it's down to a record-low price
item.description: If you need a little help with your New Year's resolution to be more active, you can save on the latest Apple Watch right now. The Apple Watch Series 11 is on sale for $299, which is $100 off and the lowest price we've seen. We named the Apple Watch Series 11 as our choice for best smartwatch overall. It scored a 90 in our review thanks to its 24 hours-plus of battery life and a thin, light design that's easy to wear. It also offers new health metrics, including Apple's hypertension alerts system and Sleep Score. The Apple Watch Series 11 deal is available on the 42mm case with a small/mediu...

item.title: This stunning LG UltraGear gaming monitor is over $300 off at Amazon
item.description: LG’s UltraGear 27-inch QHD OLED gaming monitor is down to $496.99 at Amazon, $300 off its regular $799.99 price.
